forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 67, with temperatures falling to around 65 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 8 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 55. Southwest wind 8 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

weather_report:
As the sun graces Downtown San Francisco with its warm embrace, expect a delightful day ahead, marked by clear skies and a refreshing breeze. The temperature, flirting with the mid-sixties, holds the promise of warmth that gently recedes into a cooler afternoon, inviting strolls through the lively streets or basking in the outdoor cafes. Although the coastal fog may weave its tendrils around the edges of the Bay, today’s bright blue canopy hints at a mostly sunny disposition, with only whispers of clouds lingering in the distance.

Tonight, the pleasant glow wanes a touch, giving way to partly cloudy skies, with temperatures gracefully dipping into the mid-fifties. Dressing in layers is wise—perhaps a light sweater for the evening, ensuring comfort through the swift and refreshing breeze that dances across the city. With a day like this, it’s an ideal time to explore art galleries or pop into a cozy bookstore, perhaps finding a nook to lose oneself in a good read, savoring a steaming cup of coffee as the sun sets beyond the Golden Gate.
